name: Robo Cannon
description:
Robo Cannon is a remake of an old flash game called "Kitty Cannon".

Use your mouse to click and drag the cannon to the angle you want and then press space to fire. The power meter is below the cannon.

Once fired, you can sit back and watch the little robot fly. Hitting a battery or power field gives you speed while water and TNT kills you immediately.

The goal is to get a farther distance than last time!
